I am wondering if it is possible to run an individual test case from a
test=
 class from the command line using JUnitCore?  I have searched
high and low=
 to find an answer to this question, and unfortunately the
only information=
 I have been able to obtain is how to run an
individual test from within th=
e Eclipse GUI (or by using the @Ignore
annotation and recompiling source).
=

Is this possible?  If so, how?  If not, is it possible by using
something =
other than JUnitCore?  Just to be super clear, say I have a
test class Calc=
ulatorTest with several test methods.  I want to be
able to run CalculatorT=
est.multiply, not just all of the methods in
CalculatorTest.

Thanks in adv=
ance.
